purpose: Defines the structured data inputs required by VMO (L6) for calculating the adaptive viability margin (epsilon) based on historical performance volatility.

metrics.description: Rolling standard deviation of core system metrics over the last N SST cycles (High volatility -> high epsilon requirement).
Mean absolute deviation from projected PMM thresholds post-SST deployment.
Weighted count of critical L6/L8 audit failures in the last 72 operational hours.
